metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20676 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Bootstrap before 3.4.0, XSS is possible in the tooltip data-viewport attribute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-20676` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-glyphicons-halflings - 3.4.0+dfsg-1
libjs-bootstrap - 3.4.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: twitter-bootstrap3 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.0+dfsg-1').
twitter-bootstrap4 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
